articles.title: Pardon his French: Rudy Gobert fined $25K for profane walk-off interview - KSL.com
articles.description: The league fined Rudy Gobert $25,000 for his spontaneous colorful language during his walk-off interview with NBATV on Saturday.
articles.content:
Estimated read time: 1-2 minutes
DALLAS The NBA sent a message to Rudy Gobert on Sunday: We will not pardon your French!
